author: Jamie Joseph
title: Trump privatizing student loan system would spur higher-ed reform, lower costs: expert
description: The expansion of the DOE since 1979 has led to ballooning student-loan costs, while a private-lender system could bring those them down, one expert tells Fox News Digital.
